short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lumen5 is the easiest way to engage your audience and grow your brand on social media with professional video content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Lumen5 you can create short, effective videos for social media in a snap!

This Chrome extension will help you create videos across the web.  From your blogging platform or content management system, simply click the Lumen5 icon to instantly create a video from your written content.

Supports any website with the browser button.
